IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.equip_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.equip_item GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.equip_item @account_id dbo.id_t, @character_id dbo.id_t, @item_id dbo.id_t, @equip_part TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE dbo.Inventories SET slot_id = 0 WHERE id = @item_id
INSERT INTO dbo.Equipments (account_id, character_id, equip_part, inventory_id) VALUES (@account_id, @character_id, @equip_part, @item_id)
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
